Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS
AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS
REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Relates to authorizing the son of Barry M. Dennis to be designated the beneficiary of his retirement benefits
Summary: Relates to authorizing the son of Barry M. Dennis, Gregory Dennis, to be designated the beneficiary of his retirement benefits by Bruce M. Dennis acting in his capacity as power of attorney.
ActClause: AN ACT in relation to authorizing the son of Barry M. Dennis to be designated the beneficiary of his retirement benefits
